Key Match Events: Salvador Perez missed a throw at third base, allowing one run to score
Alex Verdugo homered to put the Yankees ahead 3-2
James McCarthur allowed three hits, a walk, and a home run by Austin Wells
Chris Stratton allowed five baserunners, of which three scored
Salvy popped up and Witt somehow scored from first base
Post-Match Reflections: The Royals' magic number for the third Wild Card slot is 13
The team can get nearly all of those by themselves with 17 games left
Miscellaneous Highlights: The game was part of a multilevel series between the Royals and the Yankees
Bobby Witt Jr. is vying for the American League MVP against Aaron Judge
Aaron Judge went 2-4 with a walk while Witt only went 1-4
